fields.name: Valerie Johnson
fields.words_from_the_instructor: I've been in the wellness business for a couple of years now and I love to the feeling you get of seeing happy faces at the end of a good workout sessions! You're going to enjoy every minute of it.

fields.name: Kate Winfrey
fields.words_from_the_instructor: Here at Work Workouts we're all about the team coming together, and I thrive on that. With us you guys are gonna get your heartbeats pumping and you muscles burning, and we'll do everything as a team. Strong together!

fields.name: Stephan Silva
fields.words_from_the_instructor: Come join me in our state of the art spinning classes, we've got everything from elite to beginners. Whatever your level is, I promise you, we're going to have a lot of fun together!
